import React from 'react' import { Link,useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import products from '../products' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import rating from '../components/Rating' function ProductScreen() { const {id} = useParams(); console.log(id) console.log("hi") const product = products.find((product) => product._id === id) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

{product.rating} text={`${product.numReviews} reviews`} color={'#f8e825'}
) } export default ProductScreen
